me kathawa patan ganne apema kiyala inna yaluwo hathdenagen ekek wechcha gihan nohoth demalage helu dawasa hewath upandina uthsawaya dawaseyi.uuta demala kiyanne mekap dammath nodammath uuta thiyenne mara holiwud luk ekak [:kapital pi] ehemath naththan [diwa dotta damima].kathawata kiyanne ookata pawudar gawoth,eewath kalu pata wenawayi kiyala.ithin oya helu dawasa wenuwen gaththu patiyedi ape hathdenagen lankawe inna pasdena set una.othanadi thaleta athpudiyak gahaganna bari unath,thamun kata ariyama amaradewa mahaththayatath eerisiya hithenawayi kiyala hithagena inna......,hama supar star ekema podu sadhakaya wechchi lilan enwilop wagayak beduwa.muladi salli kiyala hithan unnath passe ookage warige hati mathak unama danagaththa thawath athin kayit wena wadak kiyala.

loka janathawagen 33 % niyojanaya karana suwishesha sanyuthiyak sahitha ji 15 kandayamata me pahadili aramuna itu kara ganime di menma goliya aarthika saha samaja prathipaththi sanwadayedi janathawa aramunu karagath sanwardhana piliweth udesa da wadagath meheyak itu kirime hakiyawak thibe.goliya mulya saha aarthika prashna hadarimatath eewata prathikriya dakwimatath, aarthika arbuda walakwimatath haki wana lesa jathyanthara mulya ratawa prathisanshodhanaya wiya yuthu bawa apage awadhanayayi.

mapillawaru (malabar muslim janathawa) 1539 dakwa kotte saha sithawaka rajadhani thula arbudayan diyunukala athara pruthugrisin lankawe sitima sambandhayen wiruddha wuha. 1538 di martim afonso da soyisa 'wedeleyi' di da 1539 di migel fereyira migamuwedi da mapillawaru awasana washayen parajaya kalaha.

eeth ithin mama hithanne eeka loku gataluwak wena ekak nahayi kiyala.parighanaka krama lekhana shilpayata ath poth thabana kenekge mattame idala thamayi padam aarambha karanna hithan inne.ee kiyanne jawa hari wenath kisima kramama lekhana bhashawak nodanna kenekge danuma mattame idala thamayi patan ganne.kiyala dena de gana oyalata pahadilida kiyala mata dana gannath ekka adahas dakwanna mathaka thiya ganna ooni.

yam pudgalayaku wyaparayak lesa kanthawan ganika wruththiye yodawa mudal upayanne nam pamanak ganika wruththiye nirathawima sambandhayen chodana gonu kala haki namuth ese nowi mulumaninma ho amathara washayen ganika wruththiyen thama jiwikawa genayanne nam ee ayata shri lanka nithi kramaya anuwa naduwak pawariya nohaki bawada kotuwa mahesthrathwaraya danwa sitiya.
siya thanathure sitiya dima masakata dina 05ka uparimayakata yatathwa adala raswimwalata sahabhagi wima sandaha sewaye hadisi awashyathawanta yatathwa watup sahitha niwadu laba diya haki ya.

asi disi'uuwa palath sabhawe wipaksha samanga ekwenawa'narambaanna03:35lokubandara sil redi bedayi narambaanna02:12nithiwedinge 'aarakshawa thahawuru karanna'sawan denna03:30manawa himikam: aasiyawe 'wishala pragathiyak'sawan denna07:23gahanu lamun 'balahathkarayen' islam aagamatasawan denna05:04skotlantha janamatha wicharaya wiwadayakasawan denna03:58	dakma indhana mila ha widuli bila pahathata - janadhipathi chinayen gini poliyata naya -ejapayajeyakumari gopita 'nawathan dunna'janadhipathi mathiwarana nithi kadanawa - jawipe wathukaraye panas dahakata 'chandayata niwadu naha' krikat awula liha ganime prayathnayak demala janathawa sinhala ugatha yuthuyi - indiyawa moltawe bottu anathurakin 'pansiyak' maruta islamiya rajyayata erehiwa oostreliyanu bhatayan islamiya rajya brithanya jathikayakuge gela sindiyiwada dim: 'baladharin sakachchawakatawath sudanam naha'ayipiel krikat kridawa winasha karanawa - arjuna sawan denna02:47'oba nathuwa oba ekka' landanaye bibisi sinhala antharjalaye

dubayi hi wesena kotipathiyanta mema mudala etharam wishala mudalak nowana nisa nobo kalakinma apita diya yata tenis kridanganayak dakiya haki wanne wimbaldan tharagawaliye dakinnata labena wiwrutha kirimata ha wasimata haki wahalaya sahitha kridanganaya sandaha wayawu mudala sochcham mudalak bawata path karamini.

eeth meka mata honda.
hari me thiyenne widiyo tika..
dhanathmaka prathicharayak denna : lamun owunge demawpiyangen agaya kirimak balaporoththu we.
parlimant eke bara wimal adinawa.rali wala barath miniha adinawa.dalas , keheliya thawa barak adinawa..oya pirisa athi aanduwak karanna ( madya magin )..
mama kirthiya ukulata gena kiri powa bath kawa athi dadi kalemi.
“api aanduwa me wasare peralanawa.
emenma janamadhyawedin wisin pathkaranu labana adhyaksha mandala samajikaya nikanma niyojanaya karanawa wenuwata owunge ladiyawan rakadimata wisheshayen katayuthu kala yuthuya.
ramanayaka mahatha wadiduratath pawasa sitiye, sorun allana bawata rajaya janawari 08 wanida poronduwak labadunnada eya nisiyakarawa ituwa athdayi yanna gataluwak pawathina bawayi.
onna mama kiyanawa mama danna ekek me prajekt eke wada karala thiyenawa.
owunta athi ee nidahasa thaba, asammatha pemwathun yana kiliti lebalayakudu apata himi natha.

dan oya kiyana widihata heta budu hamuduruwo malwaththata wadiyoth sunitha saha sopaka hamuduruwaru ehema piriwaragena mal waththe lokka ara maha wisala gettuwa wahala dayi budu hamuduruwange munatama.
ee wahanaya wu suwanda dige gihin uguren ringala badata athulu wuna.”
mama pothpath balamin padam walata sudanam wi gos usas pela panthiye hondin wada kala.
widyawata kalahakke sathya yojana kirima hara sathyata himikam kimata kisidinaka nohaki bawa owun danithi.
ehidi adahas dak wu saukhya amathyawaraya -
pisthole allan inna widiyenma mama danagaththa.
liwiya desata hari ) obata hakida mata aadaraya karanna..?”
ek ek samajaya anuwa me 'sadde damima' wenas we.

dewiyane....aya awasara illanawa noweda...?mage jiwithayada me lesama piliwalakata sadimata obata awasara dennata puluwan nam..mama thaniwama sithuwemi...mama ayata pilithurak diya yuthuya.aya ma desa bala siti..
eeta passe dipa hina wena eka nawaththala mama diha bala innawa mokada mama thama hina wenne kiyala.
namuth bhikshu jiwithayedi me thaththwaya wenas shasana brahmacharyawa kiyanne shasanika katayuthu karamin wiwaha nowi jiwithaya pawathwagena yamayi.
the wathu saha mal uyan harima alankara darshana mawanawa.
oya nakkale dana eewa ganan ganna epa.
oya pihiyak aran diwwata bandu chandiyek neme kiyala danna nikulas mama satha pahakata ganan nogena kara arala paduwe innawalu..
oya katada katha karanne ?
me athara thura hadisiye maranaya sidu wana awasthath thibenawa.
issella oya mona yaka bayila gahuwath handahana bala ganin rata yanna puluwanda kiyala..
meyalage aadaraya patangaththu mul kalaye boho dena kiwe ee sambandhayata wadi aayushak nathi weyi kiyalayi.
chayarupaya - janaka weththasinha madin pura atawaka poya madin pura atawaka poya pebarawari 21 wanada irida apara bhaga 6.26 ta labayi. 22 wana da sanduda aparabhaga 5.47 dakwa poya pawathi.
karant giyada ?
ee nisa samajaya thula wiwidha pirihim athi wenawa.
“jiwithaye aramuna kumakda?”
kalathmaka chithrapatawala pamanayi apata pawathmak thibune.
wihilu neweyi ban
moda demapiyan ne inne eekayi.
(boho denekuta thamange aagama sihiwanne wayasata giya witadiyi)
(lankawe duppath asarana janathawata apahasa kirima mage aramuna nowu bawa karunawen salakanna.
"enawa...habayi horen aran yanna neweyi, gamatama magul kiyala aran yanna" bhupa kiwwa.
eeta passe amathyasha upasenala.

kabinat mandalaye samuhika wagakima kada kala bawata chodana kara rawuf hakim amathyawarayata erehiwa kisindu aakaraye parikshanayak sidu kirimata ida nodena bawath, ohu wenuwen samuhikawa peni sitina bawath adhikarana ha bandhanagara prathisanskarana amathini nithignya thalatha athukorala pawasayi.
ohuge jiwithaye lokuma kanagatuwa thiyenne ee gana.
wathura kandu wana sthanayata mitara kihipayak nudure aththe kadapilayi.
rupiyal ek laksha wisiek dahasak watina mema adhi thakshana upakaranaya kisiwakuwath saka nosithena aakarayata shariraye sangawagena sitiya haki bawada polisiya pawasayi.
waradi adu padu ehema thiyeyi eewa tikakata nosalaka arimu neda?
aadi washayen wimasannata purudu wela thibenawa...

shiranthi rajapaksha apekshakaya wu wita eya sadharanaya kirimata idiripath karanu labana hethu, prabandha, wishwasakarana ee matha yapena jathiyak washayen owunge pile aya eewa itha pahasuwen piliganu atha. 2020 di eksath jathika pakshaya idiripath karana apekshakayata muhunadimata siduwanuye bala aragalayakata nowa prema aragalayakataya.

eekata thama me samanya sebalu inne."
ee unata meyin kathawak kiyewwama hithata sathutak enawa mata nan..

mata echchara hondata ingrisi kiyawanna ba.
ehema wenne kohomada?
nelum yaya , ape kalahithala ehema peramuna gaththanam wade nagala yayi..
ethan sita ma mage mathakaya wasara kihipayaka aapassata ragena yami.
ohu kaduwak gena pirisa madata pana owun palawa hara appawa ohuge takaran gruhayata gena yana ladi.
eeka gana mata kiyanna  wena deyak naha kiyala
pujaniya thanwala me wage dewal wena eka nam dukak malli.
dina pothak wage liyanakota lassanata liyala danna puluwan edineda jiwithaya gana.
eeth ape podi puthuta
meka thahawuru karaganna.
